Summary: moved in a pattern, two orbs approached each other then moved away. They all disapated
trends: There has been one other sighting in Piqua
There were no other sightings in Piqua on or around June 23rd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking on the adjacent street notice one prominent light under the clouds. This then moved into more lights totaling up to twenty. The first set made a diamond shape in the sky while the others made a trail. Two lights moved towards each other then moved apart. I ran home and went to my neighbors house, and got him and his wife out of his house to observe what I had saw. By this time there were about 5 lights hovering in the sky. My wife was walking with me and ran home as well. The color of the lights were an amber color if not gold. I called the news and 911. I did not have my phone with me, the only time I do not carry my phone.
